edu.xtec.jclic.bags

Class ActivityBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.bags.ActivityBag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaBag.Listener, Editable, Domable

    public class ActivityBag
extends Object
implements Editable, Domable, MediaBag.Listener
    This class stores the complete collection of activities of a JClicProject. The collection is managed through a private ArrayList of objects of type ActivityBagElement.
    Version:
    13.09.10
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
